scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.client:build: cd client && npm ci --production=false && npm run build && npm prune --production
scripts.client:e2e: cd client && npx cypress run --env ci=true
scripts.full-install: npm ci && npm run server:install && npm run client:install
scripts.lint: npm run client:lint && npm run server:lint
scripts.server:build: cd server && npm ci --production=false && npm run build && npm prune --production
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run server:test && npm run client:test
